0.0.4.name: wordpress/plugin-update-hider
0.0.4.description:
This plugin allows you to hide plugin update notifications for wordpress plugins that you do not want to update. Once this plugin is installed and activated, a link will appear under each plugin with available updates that will allow you to block notifications for that update. Once hidden, a link will appear allowing you to unhide the notifications.

This plugin uses Wordpress hooks and filters to hide the notifications.
